metadata.title: CVE-2019-6458 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GNU Recutils 1.8. There is a memory leak inrec_buf_new in rec-buf.c when called from rec_parse_rset in rec-parser.c inlibrec.a.

criterions.comment: recutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
